thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exceptional
thread.title_full: Exceptional - Review of Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: haldabbous
title: Exceptional
text:
Finest hotel i had ever stayed at.
I took the train from london and requested a pick up.There was a man who recived me at the platform helping me with my luggage to the car.At the hotel door a lady from the reception was welcomig me.Fast and prompt check in.
The staff were genuienly friendly The rooms are so comfortable and well lighted.The mattress is so comfortable and if you like you can request the type you desire.The cleanliness and luxury are the finest.There is qibla direction in the room too.
The back side rooms are very quiet.
The lobby is luxurious.Beautifully decorated.They have small chairs for the hand bag too.
All the staff is so proffessional and friendly.
The concierge will arrange everything for you even if you desire a bouquet of tulips.
Restaurant reservations are made and you will receive the confirmation note to your room in a very elegant style.
The concierge did a great job for everybody even when it was sooo busy with minimal waiting time.I called them the unkown soldiers.
These and many other things makes this hotel exceptional.
From the moment you step in, to the moment you check out ,there is nothing bad about it and if something beyond control happens the reception duty managers are there day and night to make sure that your stay is so perfect.
This stay made it difficult for me to find a better hotel anywhere else.
